AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Silken Ring assassin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Once a member of the Morag Tong, over time [PAWN_nameDef] grew disillusioned with the laws the Tong enforced. Eventually [PAWN_nameDef] was contacted by a former member of the Morag Tong, who had founded a new establishment, and was looking for members to join it.
